by  Lori Stover June  

His coworkers call him the sheriff because of his dedication to the job and distaste for His coworkers call him the sheriff because of his dedication to the job and distaste for complaining PERIOD

Hes on top of the game the head honcho his coworker Dan Guthrie said PERIOD

But after  years of working as a custodian at Pitt Sheriff Johnny Bowden has decided to retire PERIOD

At the age of  Bowden said he still has plenty of energy but he thought he might as well give retirement a try PERIOD

Right now I feel like I could keep on working but I have to go sooner or later he said PERIOD I might get out there and find out what Ive been missing PERIOD I might find out laying around is all right. before retirement Bowden didnt lay around much at all his coworkers said PERIOD

Coworker Joseph Mubanga said Bowden would never complain about being sick when ill and would keep working instead PERIOD By doing this Bowden inspired the younger workers to focus on getting the job done Mubanga said PERIOD

Guthrie said despite his strong work ethic Bowden would never bother or criticize anyone PERIOD

He was as easygoing as anybody could be Guthrie said PERIOD Even on a bad day hed make you laugh. frank Connors who has worked with Bowden for  years said that other than some lighthearted joking Bowden always did what he had to do. bowden said he likes to work and keep busy no matter the job PERIOD

His daughter Leslie Kisner said Bowden keeps himself active even outside of work PERIOD

When he has free time Bowden likes to take long walks visit his friends and visit different places around Pittsburgh PERIOD He goes to PPG Place in the winter to watch families ice skate Kisner said and he likes to go shopping in the Strip District PERIOD

Hes coming to a new frontier a new focus she said PERIOD Im encouraging him to keep on the move. only Bowdens avoidance of technology seems to reveal his age PERIOD

Bowden refuses to get a cell phone and listens to the radio instead of watching television which he says never has anything worthwhile Kisner said PERIOD

Bowden started working at Pitt in  PERIOD He began working in Scaife Hall in the medical division before transferring to the physical plant which is now called Facilities Management PERIOD

Bowden later worked in Litchfield Towers and then the Cathedral of Learning PERIOD

In the Cathedral he said he rarely had to deal with messy students but when he worked in the Towers he had to deal with students filling sinks with shaving cream pulling the fire alarm or performing other pranks PERIOD

He said he has learned about every nook and cranny in the Cathedral Connors said PERIOD

In general Bowden said he has enjoyed his time working at the University PERIOD He said working at Pitt has brought him many opportunities such as taking classes for free PERIOD

Last Thursday his coworkers and supervisors threw him a retirement party to acknowledge his years of service PERIOD

Not everyone gets  years Connors said PERIOD
